channel.title: Hey everyone join please :D give the server a chance
channel.description:
http://rune4death.biz/ click on "play now" and choose a server we have 2 servers a 317 and a 742
Please come and join us give the server a chance don't just come in and judge it straight away. We have active players difference of course is timezone staff are on to help and we might be looking for new staff for the new server.
The 742 is real fun full working bosses including queen black dragon,emotes working,lunar,ancients and curses working and lots more just try it out.
But you need to be active and help people so don't expect to get chosen straight away but please come and try it out thank you.

item.title: Hey everyone join please :D give the server a chance
item.dc:creator: @Snipa Snipa
item.description:
@Snipa wrote:

If you would add some media and some information you can get a full potential out of the advertisement section

Read full topic
item.source: Hey everyone join please :D give the server a chance

item.title: Hey everyone join please :D give the server a chance
item.dc:creator: @l11 l
item.description:
@l11 wrote:

Seriously?
Add pictures and more media.
I’m positive that no one will join if this stays like that.

Read full topic
item.source: Hey everyone join please :D give the server a chance

item.title: Hey everyone join please :D give the server a chance
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

I judge your sever the moment I read this thread. I don’t say “hmm, I’ll spend about 10-15 minutes of my time to download the cache to see if I like this”, I want to see what it’s like beforehand. This is why many new severs fail, rather than say “Don’t judge the server from the advertisement or from the first hour”, how about you show me why I should pick this one over one on the toplist, besides the smaller community.

Read full topic
item.source: Hey everyone join please :D give the server a chance
